name: unite-ui
description: Unite UI responds to your syntax for a more unified feel.
author: Tom Bremer <tom@tbremer.com>

closeButtonPosition.title: Close Button Location
closeButtonPosition.description: Change tab close buttons to left or right

condensedTabs.title: Condense Tabs
condensedTabs.description: Enable a smaller font and less padding on tabs

condensedTreeView.title: Condense Tree View
condensedTreeView.description: Enable a smaller font and less padding on the tree
